name: Winners' Pool
long_description: The undersides of the transplanted palms glow brilliant magenta from the pool's excessive underwater LED's. The water is perfect temperature, and you're so relaxed that you could whiz, but you mostly don't. "Nice job. I wanna take a bite outta your butt." Acid Burn says, swimming over next to you and looking extra fine. "Whoa! Check that out." The walls nearby have high scores written all over them! Acid Burn gestures at the diving board. "Why don't you trick off that plank and go for a better score?"

room_features.name: Acid Burn
room_features.description: This might just be the love of your life- or at least of high school.

room_features.name: Diving Board
room_features.description: CANNON BALLLL! Back into the game!!!

room_features.name: Walls
room_features.description: There are some sweet tags on here.

room_connections.label: Street
room_connections.description: the place where it all began...
